properties.description: Name of the column in which the cell is
properties.name: column

properties.description: Cell type, it can be header or entry
properties.name: type

properties.description: String to be inserted in a span
properties.name: value

methods.description: CSS changes for the content on IE
methods.name: createCellContentStyleForIE

methods.description: Generates the content with the given value
methods.name: generateContent
